metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1882 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s pipes functionalityin how a user performs manipulations with the pipe post_one_notification()after free_pipe_info() that is already called. This flaw allows a localuser to crash or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
